Feedback.desc: You have trouble with the software? You have a feature request? Don't worry, contact the development team...
Feedback.docText: Open the online documentation (maybe your question is already answered there).
Feedback.emailText: Send a mail to contact us (it's not possible to send money with mail, but you can ask how to transfer ðŸ’µ).
Feedback.githubText: Open an issue on GitHub (for bugs and feature requests).
